channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Secret Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Secret Server

item.title: CVE-2021-20508|2024-09-17T04:09:56.319Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server up to 11.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 199322.

item.title: CVE-2020-4841|2024-09-17T02:01:33.929Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.6 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 190045.

item.title: CVE-2019-4640|2024-09-17T02:01:41.833Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 processes patches, image backups and other updates without sufficiently verifying the origin and integrity of the code which could result in an attacker executing malicious code. IBM X-Force ID: 170046.

item.title: CVE-2021-20582|2024-09-17T01:02:08.897Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server up to 11.0 stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 199328.

item.title: CVE-2020-4323|2024-09-17T02:11:44.325Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 177514.
